segue_the_chain: From Echo, which is short for Echo-cardiogram (used to diagnose arterial diseases) to artery…

segue_dave.line: Echo and The Bunnymen released records for Zoo Records, a label which dissolved in 1982, while The Jam broke up in the same year...
segue_dave.explanation: Echo and The Bunnymen released a former album with Zoo Records, a record label that stop existing in 1982 and The Jam was formed as a band in the same year.
